No. 45. Part 1.1. Consequent on Chitralis moving into Kamdesh Valley, General Wakil Khan is reported to have advanced towards Bashgul with 1,000 rifles and sent two battalions from Nari to Dolai (opposite Birkot). Chitralis advanced contrary to orders ; steps being taken to put a stop to such incidents.2. Afridis' deputation under leading Mullahs reported gone at invitation of Afghans to attend meeting at Jalalabad.3. Air reconnaissance from Bannu up Kaitu and Zamba rivers, also over Shabak, Matun and Charkai Valley, reported no concentration or abnormal movements.4. South Waziristan quiet; Wana, Tanai, Sarwekai reported practically un-occupied.Part 2. Nil.Paras. 1 and 2 not communicated to Press.
